modType.name: Role Type
modType.description: Select your role: 1 = Moderator, 2 = Elder Moderator, 3 = Leaderboard Moderator, 4 = Developer

enableFeaturing.name: Enable Level Featuring
enableFeaturing.description: Allows you to feature levels (Moderator & Elder only)

enableEpic.name: Enable Epic Rating
enableEpic.description: Allows you to mark levels as Epic (Elder Moderator only)

enableCreatorPoints.name: Enable Creator Points
enableCreatorPoints.description: Allows you to award creator points (Moderator & Elder only)

showLevelPasswords.name: Show Level Passwords
showLevelPasswords.description: Display passwords for copy-protected levels (All roles)

enableCommentModeration.name: Enable Comment Moderation
enableCommentModeration.description: Allows you to delete any comments (Elder Moderator & Developer only)

glowingUsername.name: Glowing Username
glowingUsername.description: Makes your username glow like RobTop's (Developer only)

unlockAllIcons.name: Unlock All Icons
unlockAllIcons.description: Grants access to all icons and colors (Visual only)

bypassRateLimits.name: Bypass Rate Limits
bypassRateLimits.description: Skip cooldown timers for ratings and uploads (Moderator & above)

name: FakeGDMod
description: A comprehensive mod that simulates moderator, elder moderator, leaderboard moderator, and developer privileges with custom moderator control panel, reported levels management, user moderation, and authentic features
